# automaticallyConfigureSession

**Instance Property**

An indication of whether to use an automatically configured AR session.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var automaticallyConfigureSession: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When enabled, the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ARView] automatically runs an `RealityKit/ARSession` with a default configuration. RealityKit updates that configuration based  on t camera mode and scene anchors. When disabled, you need to provide a configuration object and run the session manually.

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Configuring the AR session

- **session**: The AR session that supports the view’s rendering.
- **renderOptions**: The render options that configure the view’s AR session.
- **renderCallbacks**: A container that holds the view’s render callbacks.
